Training OBJs​
71-PLT-5100: Conduct Troop Leading Procedures​
07-PLT-1093 Conduct an Attack - Rifle Platoon (SBCT) ​
07-PLT-3036: Integrate Indirect Fire Support​
07-PLT-1341: Conduct Tactical Movement​
07-PLT-3027: Integrate Direct Fires ​
07-PLT-3000: Conduct Support by Fire
Concept Statement: B TRP will conduct a TRM into a contested AO. X PLT attacks to destroy an ENY C2 Node IVO OBJ Cobra. B TRP will be enabled by TRP mortars, Troop sUAS, and SQDN sUAS assets.
PLT STX 31JUL-01AUG2023
sections.SUSTAINMENT:
CL I: M-M-A
CL IV: All Vehicles fueled at Fuel Point prior to SP. CL V: PLTs will deploy to ATK lane and draw CL V at the Ammo point prior to
sections.PURPOSE: of this training exercise is to synchronize mounted and dismounted maneuver, integrate enablers, and validate
sections.KEY TASKS:
Conduct a raid of known ENY supply cache IVO OBJ Clear RTE of ENY OP
Conduct CCP operations
Conduct patrol base operations
Training Objectives:
Identify mounted and dismounted routes to objective
Integrate sUAS assets to recon the AO and OBJ
Drive tactical scenarios and integrate ICVs into SBF
Use mortars to set conditions in the AO
Validate Platoon and Troop level
sections.END STATE: Platoons are trained to conduct a raid and integrate enablers prior to Saber Junction 23.
